en.title: FE Welcomes Aussie QP Wearer, Boxer Daniel "The Rock" Dawson!
en.content:
Daniel "The Rock" Dawson with Presidential Director Rachel Thomas and Natasha (His Manager) in Perth.
 		  
Daniel "The Rock" Dawson (born 15th October 1977) is a professional Australian super welterweight kick boxer, boxer and martial artist, fighting out of Perth, Australia.

BOXING CAREER

Daniel Dawson has a boxing record of 31 fights with 30 wins(21 by knockouts).He suffered his only career loss to Daniel Geale, for the vacant IBO world Title.

KICKBOXING CAREER

Daniel "The Rock" Dawson has fought many great kick boxing champions in the world. His record stands at 65 fights with 53 wins (31 by knockouts). He has beaten fighters such as John Wayne Parr (in a match against John Wayne Parr, JWP beat the Rock in Muay Thai by points), Shane Chapman, Bruce Macfie and Jordan Tai.

KICKBOXING CAREER Daniel "The Rock" Dawson has fought many great kick boxing champions in the world. His record stands at 65 fights with 53 wins(31 by knockouts).
